name: tech shot
description:
Introduction:

your been hunted in a grass land when its night you need heat to stay alive (don't go far from the campfire the second bar is heat bar) when u beat the boss your win but if you want more fun your still alive to play around

controls :

wasd to move

f to buy stuff (will use gear to buy stuff so don't forget to pick gears up)

esc to pause

click to shoot
